message.content:
cs.HC, cs.MA, cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.LG

The paper focuses on context awareness and mobile usage, which are both related to human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The paper also deals with measuring and utilizing data, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.MA). Additionally, the paper addresses the challenges of dealing with multiple sources of context, which is related to information retrieval (cs.IR) and statistical learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper presents a method for selecting context sources while minimizing energy consumption, which is related to systems and control (cs.SI).
